channel.title: Releasing Processes on ownCloud
channel.description: Recent content in Releasing Processes on ownCloud

item.title: Releasing Guide
item.description: New ocis Version Steps for Major or Minor Releases Overview Details Steps for Patch Releases Only Overview Details Update Documentation Related Data Envvar Changes Prepare Admin Docs To prepare an oCIS production release, you must follow a specific sequence of steps in the correct order. New ocis Version Use this detailed copy/paste checklists for Jira when starting a new release. The examples use the following versions which will need to be adapted for the planned release: For Major and Minor versions: 7.

item.title: Troubleshooting
item.description: Backport Missing Commits Documentation Deployment Example Web Extensions ocis_full This document covers some of the issues that can happen during the release process. Use this detailed copy/paste checklists for the PR when starting a backport. Backport Missing Commits Once the stable-x.y branch has been created but work has been merged into master, these changes will not appear in the stable branch unless backporting is used. Any change applied to stable-7.
